info.name: tumblr - Icon Fix
info.description: NOTE: As of 01.01.2013 this style will no longer be supported. Fixes most issues with the "new" icons displaying on top of custom tumblr styles.
info.additionalInfo: Enable this style after your initial problem dashboard style. The option of Text Labels/No Text Labels depends on your icon bar style. Screenshot displays before/after example. In this example, the option No Text Labels was selected, since text labels were already provided with the style. 03-21-2012 - Updated to fix most dashboard styles that do not allow New Post icon links to function.
